info.name: Drone display name
info.description:
Added a graphQL mutation so the drone display name can be changed by the user. The field is optional and can be left blank. This field can be updated and changed back to blank (null) if needed.

**End Point:**

[Ariadne GraphQL](https://api.paladindrones.dev/watchtower/)
